forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 10 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Mostly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 8am. Mostly sunny, with a high near 66. West southwest wind 9 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As twilight cloaks Downtown San Francisco, the skies wear a gentle shroud of clouds, whispering the promise of a light drizzle after nightfall. A cool breeze dances in from the west-southwest, carrying with it a hint of the ocean's breath—a signature of San Francisco's ever-changing weather. The air is notably fresh, teetering around a mild 57 degrees, inviting a comfortable layering of light jackets or cardigans, perfect for a stroll along the waterfront. 

Tomorrow holds the promise of clearer skies, revealing a mostly sunny disposition with highs gently nudging towards 66. The day will begin with a chance of morning drizzle, perhaps kissing the city like a soft reminder of the marine layer lingering nearby, but as the sun climbs, hints of warmth will emerge, ideal for leisurely outdoor pursuits. An afternoon spent exploring local cafes or taking a serene walk by the bay may be just the remedy for the soul, complemented by the invigorating coastal air. Take a moment to relish the city’s vibrancy, as the fog might simply add a layer of mystery to the skyline, a characteristic charm of this enchanting locale.
